item.description:
Have you been thinking about starting a meditation practice, but keep putting it off? Maybe itâ€™s time to finally overcome that resistance and start enjoying the peace offered by turning within through meditation.

Or, perhaps you are already meditating but could use a refresher or some inspiration to strengthen your practice.

Allan will present a simple, effective meditation technique, as well as the fundamentals to get you started in this wonderful spiritual practice: experiencing the power of the Light within you.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: The Power of the Light Within
